title: Python Automatic Attendance System with OpenCV
description: Built an automatic attendance system using Python and OpenCV with facial recognition technology to identify students and automatically mark their attendance.

title: Intelligent Inventory Manager Chatbot
description: Developed an intelligent customer support chatbot using NLP, SpaCy, NLTK, TensorFlow, and Hugging Face Transformers. Built with Python, Flask, React, and PostgreSQL.

title: Music Website
description: Designed and developed a music website using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and backend technologies like Node.js, Express.js, and React with features like audio players and user authentication.

title: Stock Market Management System in Java
description: Created a stock market management system in Java that allows users to simulate stock trading, view market trends, and manage their portfolio.
